text:
Fowler, White, Collins, Gillen. Humkey and Trenam
ATTORNEYS AT LAW
FIRST FEDERAL. BUILOINO
CITY NATIONAL. BANK BUILOINO
FLORIDA NATIONAL BANK BUILDINO
ST.
'FOWHITE'
PLEASE REPLY TO :
P.O.BOX 1438
TAMPA, FLORIDA
May 30, 1967
33001
Mrs. Marjorie Newman
Program Director, WFSU-FM
The Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida 32306
Dear Marjorie:
There is very little time to write, but I do want
to acknowledge your letter of May 23 before I leave
on a trip which will keep me out of the office the
balance of this week.
I am sending you herewith a copy of the reply I
received from Senator Pastore, together with the
material which he enclosed.
I certainly would not object to copies of my letter
being sent to the full committee, and hope you and
the others there will feel free to do this if you
think it would serve some purpose in connection with
other material that may be prepared. However, I feel
it might be somewhat presumptuous of me to do this
directly, and I hope you will understand and agree.
With best regards.
Sincere]/
LeRoy Coll(ns
